title: Untitled from Homage to Picasso (Hommage à Picasso)
medium: Lithograph from a portfolio of 31 lithographs (one with aquatint, one with collotype, one with screenprint), 22 screenprints (one with embossing, one with flocking, one with stencil), 11 etchings (five with aquatint, one with aquatint and drypoint, one with aquatint, drypoint, and engraving), three aquatints (one with etching), and two woodcuts
